TopicTitle: PPFX Not showing on steam download...

Articles.Content:
Hi guys, sorry if this has been posted else where, but i don't think they solve my particular problem. 

My problem is that when I had my KSP purchase on the website and downloaded KSP, PPFX worked. Then I moved my purchase to steam and now when I start the game I can't turn on PPFX. It's not a big deal but i would like to have it work again... It looked sweet.![:cool:](//kerbal-forum-uploads.s3.us-west-2.amazonaws.com/emoticons/default_k_cool.gif)

Ty for your help

LickableIce - Licking Eeloo for days.... ![:P](//kerbal-forum-uploads.s3.us-west-2.amazonaws.com/emoticons/default_k_tongue.gif) :P ![:P](//kerbal-forum-uploads.s3.us-west-2.amazonaws.com/emoticons/default_k_tongue.gif) :P ![:P](//kerbal-forum-uploads.s3.us-west-2.amazonaws.com/emoticons/default_k_tongue.gif) :P ![:P](//kerbal-forum-uploads.s3.us-west-2.amazonaws.com/emoticons/default_k_tongue.gif) :P ![:P](//kerbal-forum-uploads.s3.us-west-2.amazonaws.com/emoticons/default_k_tongue.gif) :P ![:P](//kerbal-forum-uploads.s3.us-west-2.amazonaws.com/emoticons/default_k_tongue.gif)

PPFX is hardware dependant, please post your game logs and dxdiag so we can troubleshoot this, see the sticked support threads for more information ![:)](//kerbal-forum-uploads.s3.us-west-2.amazonaws.com/emoticons/default_k_smiley.gif)

Have you tried turning on PPFX directly in the settings.cfg file? If not, try setting EDGE\_HIGHLIGHTING\_PPFX=True manually in the file and see if it works.

I had this issue, though not with steam, in .90 after I replaced my graphics card. Though the new card was quite capable of using the feature, the setting in game would not recognize it. Editing the settings file directly solved this issue.
sorry i was gone for a month, but yeah. I just tried changing the cfg file. still nothing.
Anti-aliasing needs to be on or it won't work, other than that it should be there just greyed out if you can't use it.

Oh ill try that, and i was just about to post the dxdialog, do you still need that?

- - - Updated - - -

Thanks sal\_vager! That worked! ![:D](//kerbal-forum-uploads.s3.us-west-2.amazonaws.com/emoticons/default_k_cheesy.gif)
